name: Data-Backup-Bot
description: This is a simple & powerfull autofilter bot

CHANNELS.description: Username or ID of channel or group. Separate multiple IDs by space.

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

PICS.description: Add some telegraph link of pictures .

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Bot Logs,Give a channel id with -100xxxxxxx

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: ID of channel.Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

USE_CAPTION_FILTER.description: Whether bot should use captions to improve search results. (True False)

MAX_RIST_BTNS.description: Maximum number of serch result buttons count ⚠️below 10 only

CUSTOM_FILE_CAPTION.description: A custom file caption for your files. formatable with , file_name, file_caption, file_size, Read Readme.md for better understanding.

DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in mongoDB.

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collections. Defaults to Telegram_files. If you are using the same database, then use different collection name for each bot

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Updated Channel Username Without @ Not Chanel ID

IMDB.description: Imdb, the view of information when making True/False

IMDB_TEMPLATE.value: 🗂 𝚃𝚒𝚝𝚕𝚎: {title} 🎭 𝙶𝚎𝚗𝚛𝚎𝚜: {genres} 📆 𝚈𝚎𝚊𝚛: {year} ⭐️ 𝚁𝚊𝚝𝚒𝚗𝚐: {rating}/10 ● {votes} 🗣 𝙻𝚊𝚗𝚐𝚞𝚊𝚐𝚎𝚜: {languages} 📀 𝚁𝚞𝚗 𝚃𝚒𝚖𝚎: {runtime} Minutes 🎛 𝙲𝚘𝚞𝚗𝚝𝚛𝚒𝚎𝚜: {countries} 🧑🏻‍⚖️ 𝙽𝚘𝚝𝚎: This message will be Auto-deleted after 5 minutes to avoid copyright issues. 📖 𝚂𝚝𝚘𝚛𝚢: {plot} 🙋🏻 𝚁𝚎𝚚𝚞𝚎𝚜𝚝𝚎𝚍 𝙱𝚢: {message.from_user.mention}

IMDB_DELET_TIME.description: bot risult aouto delet time in second do to avoid group copyright issue. default is 300

SINGLE_BUTTON.description: choose b/w single or double buttons (True = single / False = double)

START_TXT.description: bot start message text [ {mention} = bot startd user name {bot_name} = your bot name
START_TXT.value: 👋 𝙷𝙴𝙻𝙾 {mention} 𝙼𝚈 𝙽𝙰𝙼𝙴 𝙸𝚂 {bot_name}, 𝙸 𝙲𝙰𝙽 𝙿𝚁𝙾𝚅𝙸𝙳𝙴 𝙼𝙾𝚅𝙸𝙴𝚂, 𝙹𝚄𝚂𝚃 𝙰𝙳𝙳 𝙼𝙴 𝚃𝙾 𝚈𝙾𝚄𝚁 𝙶𝚁𝙾𝚄𝙿 𝙰𝙽𝙳 𝙼𝙰𝙺𝙴 𝙼𝙴 𝙰𝙳𝙼𝙸𝙽... 🧑🏻‍💻 𝙳𝙴𝚅𝙴𝙻𝙾𝙿𝙴𝚁 𝙱𝚈: @VijayAdithyaa

BTN_LOCK_TEXT.description: Button Lock text use one person search risult dont use other person 😁 alert text

FORCE_TEXT.description: custom force sub text (use ** = bold / use ``=  mono)

WELCOME.description: custom group welcome messege (new user neme use this code= {user} / your group name use this code= {chat})
WELCOME.value: 👋 𝙷𝙸 {mention}. 🥳 𝚆𝙴𝙻𝙲𝙾𝙼𝙴 𝚃𝙾 {group_name}! ❯ 𝙽𝙰𝙼𝙴 : {first_name} {last_name} ❯ 𝚃𝙴𝙻𝙴𝙶𝚁𝙰𝙼 𝙸𝙳 : {from_user.id} ❯ 𝙳𝙰𝚃𝙰 𝙲𝙴𝙽𝚃𝚁𝙴: {dc_id} ❯ 𝚄𝚂𝙴𝚁 𝙿𝚁𝙾𝙵𝙸𝙻𝙴: Click Here 🎉 Thank you for join {group_name} 🧑🏻‍💻 𝙳𝙴𝚅𝙴𝙻𝙾𝙿𝙴𝚁 𝙱𝚈: @VijayAdithyaa

P_TTI_SHOW_OFF.description: Customize Result Buttons to BOT PM or Send file in pm(True = BOT PM OFF/ False = BOT PM ON)
